You can hold breath for 1 hour.
You don't need food to live.
~Undeath~.Effect:
You are immune to common diseases, can hold your breath for up to 1 hour, and do not require food to survive, but you do water and require 8 hours of sleep per day.
You take +50% Damage from Fire and attacks done with silver weapons.
You are considered Undead.

~Burden of Passing~.Effect: Your are always 1 Level higher than what you're supposed to be.
~Burden of Passing~.Notes: e.g. if playing with Experience, even if you have gained enough Experience to be Level 3, you are Level 4, but still require Experience for Level 3 to 4 to Level up - and so on. If playing with milestone Levels, you are simply always always 1 Level higher than what you're supposed to be. Maximum Level is 10.

~Valiant~.Effect:
When you drop to or below 0 Health, you can still take your next turn without penalty and your Health remains 0.
After your next turn, if your Health is 0 or less, you Fall.
You also Fall in that time if you take Damage again (and your Health can thus go below 0).

~Sense Souls~.Effect: You know the locations of any living Units within 15 meters that are not obstructed by thick materials.
~Sense Souls~.Notes: The more obstructed the space between you and living Units is, the fainter you feel it. 2 meters of obstruction completely hides the Units.

Combat Extras: Your lifespan is up to 100 years (and +2 Health Regen was added automatically).
~Beating Heart~.Effect:
Get an Affliction of choice (see Feats).
You slow down the decaying of your body and increase your life span by up to 100 years.
Your Health Regen increases by 2.

~O.B.E.~.Effect:
Your soul temporarily exits your body, leaving your body motionless on the ground (Stunned).
While outside your body, the soul can't do anything except move around normally at your current speed and perceive.
~O.B.E.~.Notes: You can return to your body for 0 Actions.

~Kindled~.Effect:
You are no longer weak to Fire Damage.
After every worthy combat encounter, if your Health is below 25% (even Fallen), heal back to 25% Health (skipping your Health Regen).

~Numb Revenge~.Effect:
Choose an enemy near you.
That enemy performs an attack on you.
If you survive the attack, you gain 1 Action which you can use to make one attack or use one Ability on that enemy.

~Jack of all Trades~.Effect: You gain +1 in your 2 lowest Stats.

~Talented~.Effect: You are Skilled in any 2 non-combat Skills.
~Talented~.Notes: The 5 Weapon Categories are 1-Handed Melee Weapons, 2-Handed Melee Weapons, 1-Handed Ranged Weapons, 2-Handed Ranged Weapons, and Shields.

~Human Vigilence~.Effect: Whenever you make a Check (before the roll), instead of rolling, you can automatically take the number 6 for the die (as if you rolled 6) for that Check.

~Hidden Talents~.Effect: Gain +1 in a Stat of choice that is lower than 3.
~Hidden Talents~.Notes: The Stat can't go higher than 3.

~Magic Diversity~.Effect: Pick either Arcane, Eldritch or Divine, and you can also Know Abilities from that Basic Ability List (on top of the Ability Lists from your Class).

~Ignorance Bliss~.Effect:
In Abilities that use Sense, Intelligence or Charisma, you can use the number 3 instead.
You gain Skilled in Luck.
~Ignorance Bliss~.Notes: E.g. Chilling Shout becomes 15 (12 + 3) instead of 12 + ^Charisma^. Phase Orb becomes 2d6 + 3 + 3 instead of 2d6 + ^Intelligence + Charisma^.

~Apex of Evolution~.Effect:
Your starting Stats distribution is -1, -1, 3, 3, 3 (instead of -1, 0, 1, 2, 3).
You may pick any number of Racial Ability Choices, but each of them costs -1 in a Stat of choice.

~Battle Anguish~.Effect:
You do not suffer Exhaustion when you are healed and rise from being Fallen in combat.
However, after you Fall in combat, you can no longer use Abilities that Heal or cost 0 Actions (for the rest of this combat).

~Boiling Blood~.Effect:
Use after you make a Damage roll.
Increase all the Damage of it by 50%.
~Boiling Blood~.Notes:
Extra Abilities over an attack are not increased (e.g. Smite), because they are an extra Damage roll. Only increase the total numbers on the dice by 50%, rounded down, without bonuses.
Note that some Abilities have multiple rolls, like Magic Missile, Slam, etc.

~Fierceness~.Effect: You can use any weapon with your Might Stat (instead of Dexterity, in some cases).

~Bloodthirst~.Effect: Gain an additional Half-Action this turn.

~Savage Attacks~.Effect:
Use after you roll for Damage.
Choose one of the rolled Damage dice and double its value.
You take Damage equal to the initial die rolled.

~Bloodshed Wish~.Effect: You gain +1 Might or Dexterity (if it's lower than your highest stat), and you can Know Abilities from the Bloodshed Ability List, even if it's not normally available to your Class.
